hero.title: About AgencyPro
hero.subtitle: We're a passionate team of digital experts dedicated to helping businesses thrive in the digital age.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2013, AgencyPro started as a small team of creative professionals with a vision to revolutionize digital services. Over the years, we've grown into a full-service agency, helping hundreds of businesses achieve their digital goals.
story.paragraph2: Our commitment to innovation, quality, and client satisfaction has been the driving force behind our success. We believe in building long-term partnerships and delivering exceptional results that exceed expectations.
story.paragraph3: Today, we're proud to be leaders in video editing, digital marketing, web development, app development, photo editing, and SEO services.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy describes how AgencyPro collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our services.

informationWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, use our services, or contact us for support.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, process transactions, and communicate with you.

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

yourRights.title: Your Rights
yourRights.content: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. Contact us to exercise these rights.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@agencypro.com.

hero.title: Company Profile
hero.subtitle: Leading digital agency delivering innovative solutions since 2013.

overview.title: Company Overview
overview.content: AgencyPro is a full-service digital agency specializing in web development, digital marketing, video editing, and more. We help businesses thrive in the digital world.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To empower businesses with innovative digital solutions that drive growth and create lasting impact.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To be the leading digital agency globally, known for excellence, innovation, and client satisfaction.

items.title: Innovation
items.description: We embrace new technologies and creative solutions.

items.title: Excellence
items.description: We strive for the highest quality in everything we do.

items.title: Collaboration
items.description: We work together with our clients and team members.

items.title: Integrity
items.description: We conduct business with honesty and transparency.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using AgencyPro's services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

services.title: Services
services.content: AgencyPro provides digital marketing, web development, video editing, and related services as described on our website.

userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
userResponsibilities.content: You agree to provide accurate information and use our services in compliance with applicable laws and regulations.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: All content, features, and functionality of our services are owned by AgencyPro and are protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content: AgencyPro shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with the use of our services.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: Either party may terminate this agreement at any time with or without cause.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: This agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Bangladesh.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: For questions about these Terms & Conditions, please contact us at legal@agencypro.com.

applyForm.title: Apply for this Position
applyForm.error: Error submitting application. Please try again.

webDeveloperLaravel.title: Web Developer (PHP Laravel)
webDeveloperLaravel.description: We are seeking a skilled Web Developer proficient in PHP and Laravel to join our dynamic team. You will be responsible for developing robust, scalable web applications using modern frameworks and best practices.
responsibilities: Develop and maintain web applications using PHP and Laravel framework
Collaborate with designers and backend developers to implement user interfaces
Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code
Participate in code reviews and contribute to team knowledge sharing
Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability
Troubleshoot and debug issues in production environments
requirements: 3+ years of experience in PHP development
Strong proficiency in Laravel framework
Experience with MySQL or other relational databases
Knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and AJAX
Familiarity with version control systems (Git)
Understanding of RESTful APIs and web services
Experience with front-end frameworks like Vue.js or React is a plus

webDeveloperMERN.title: Web Developer (MERN Stack)
webDeveloperMERN.description: Join our team as a MERN Stack Developer to build cutting-edge web applications. You'll work with MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js to create innovative solutions for our clients.
responsibilities: Develop full-stack web applications using MERN technologies
Design and implement RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express.js
Create responsive user interfaces with React.js
Work with MongoDB for database design and management
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products
Participate in agile development processes and sprint planning
requirements: 2+ years of experience in full-stack development
Proficiency in JavaScript, Node.js, Express.js, React.js, and MongoDB
Experience with state management libraries (Redux, Context API)
Knowledge of RESTful API design and implementation
Familiarity with version control (Git) and CI/CD pipelines
Understanding of responsive design and cross-browser compatibility
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Heroku) is advantageous

seoAnalyst.title: SEO Analyst
seoAnalyst.description: As an SEO Analyst, you'll play a crucial role in improving our clients' search engine rankings. You'll conduct keyword research, analyze website performance, and implement optimization strategies.
responsibilities: Conduct comprehensive keyword research and analysis
Perform on-page and technical SEO audits
Monitor and report on website performance metrics
Implement SEO best practices across client websites
Collaborate with content and development teams for SEO integration
Stay updated with the latest SEO trends and algorithm changes
requirements: 2+ years of experience in SEO or digital marketing
Proficiency with SEO tools (Google Analytics, SEMrush, Ahrefs)
Strong understanding of search engine algorithms and ranking factors
Experience with HTML, CSS, and basic website structure
Analytical mindset with excellent problem-solving skills
Knowledge of local SEO and mobile optimization
Familiarity with content management systems (WordPress, etc.)

seoExpert.title: SEO Expert
seoExpert.description: We're looking for an experienced SEO Expert to lead our search optimization efforts. You'll develop and execute advanced SEO strategies to drive organic traffic and improve search rankings.
responsibilities: Develop and implement comprehensive SEO strategies
Lead keyword research and competitive analysis projects
Manage and optimize large-scale SEO campaigns
Conduct technical SEO audits and implement fixes
Analyze performance data and provide actionable insights
Mentor junior SEO team members and contribute to knowledge sharing
requirements: 5+ years of proven SEO experience
Expert-level knowledge of SEO tools and platforms
Experience with enterprise-level SEO campaigns
Strong analytical and strategic thinking skills
Proficiency in data analysis and reporting
Knowledge of advanced SEO techniques (schema markup, etc.)
Experience with link building and content marketing

contentWriter.title: Content Writer
contentWriter.description: Join our creative team as a Content Writer. You'll craft engaging, SEO-optimized content for websites, blogs, and marketing materials to help our clients connect with their audiences.
responsibilities: Write high-quality, engaging content for various platforms
Research and incorporate SEO best practices into content
Collaborate with marketing and design teams on content strategies
Edit and proofread content for accuracy and clarity
Stay updated with content marketing trends and best practices
Manage content calendars and meet deadlines
requirements: 2+ years of content writing experience
Strong command of English grammar and style
Knowledge of SEO principles and keyword research
Experience with content management systems
Ability to write for different tones and audiences
Proficiency in Microsoft Office or Google Workspace
Portfolio showcasing writing samples

contentCreator.title: Content Creator
contentCreator.description: As a Content Creator, you'll be responsible for developing innovative content strategies and producing multimedia content that captivates audiences and drives engagement.
responsibilities: Develop content strategies aligned with brand objectives
Create engaging multimedia content (videos, graphics, social media posts)
Collaborate with cross-functional teams on content production
Analyze content performance and optimize for better results
Stay current with social media trends and platform algorithms
Manage content calendars and coordinate with external creators
requirements: 3+ years of experience in content creation or digital marketing
Proficiency in content creation tools (Adobe Creative Suite, Canva)
Strong understanding of social media platforms and analytics
Experience with video editing software is a plus
Creative thinking and ability to generate innovative ideas
Excellent communication and collaboration skills
Portfolio demonstrating content creation skills
benefits: Access to latest tools and software
Flexible working hours and remote options

digitalMarketingSpecialist.title: Digital Marketing Specialist
digitalMarketingSpecialist.description: Drive digital marketing campaigns and strategies for our clients. You'll manage social media, PPC campaigns, and email marketing to boost online presence and engagement.
responsibilities: Develop and execute digital marketing campaigns
Manage social media accounts and create engaging content
Optimize PPC campaigns for maximum ROI
Analyze campaign performance and provide insights
Collaborate with design and content teams
Stay updated with digital marketing trends
requirements: 2+ years in digital marketing
Experience with social media platforms and tools
Knowledge of Google Ads and analytics
Strong analytical and creative skills
Proficiency in marketing automation tools
Understanding of SEO and content marketing

uiuxDesigner.title: UI/UX Designer
uiuxDesigner.description: Create stunning user interfaces and experiences for web and mobile applications. You'll design intuitive, user-friendly interfaces that enhance user satisfaction.
responsibilities: Design user interfaces for web and mobile applications
Conduct user research and usability testing
Create wireframes, prototypes, and mockups
Collaborate with developers to implement designs
Ensure designs are responsive and accessible
Stay updated with design trends and best practices
requirements: 3+ years of UI/UX design experience
Proficiency in design tools (Figma, Adobe XD, Sketch)
Strong portfolio showcasing design projects
Knowledge of user-centered design principles
Understanding of responsive design
Experience with prototyping tools

videoEditor.title: Video Editor
videoEditor.description: Edit professional videos for clients, including cutting, color grading, sound design, and special effects. You'll work on various projects from commercials to social media content.
responsibilities: Edit raw footage into polished videos
Apply color correction and grading
Incorporate sound design and music
Add special effects and animations
Collaborate with clients and team members
Meet project deadlines and quality standards
requirements: 2+ years of video editing experience
Proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects
Knowledge of color grading and audio editing
Understanding of video formats and codecs
Creative eye for storytelling
Portfolio of video editing work

photoEditor.title: Photo Editor
photoEditor.description: Retouch and manipulate photos for professional results. You'll work on product photography, portraits, and marketing materials to enhance visual appeal.
responsibilities: Retouch and enhance photographs
Perform color correction and adjustments
Remove backgrounds and composite images
Prepare images for web and print
Collaborate with photographers and designers
Maintain high-quality standards
requirements: 2+ years of photo editing experience
Proficiency in Adobe Photoshop
Knowledge of photo retouching techniques
Understanding of color theory and printing
Attention to detail
Portfolio of edited photos

appDeveloper.title: App Developer
appDeveloper.description: Develop native and cross-platform mobile applications. You'll work on iOS and Android apps using modern technologies and frameworks.
responsibilities: Develop mobile applications for iOS and Android
Implement UI/UX designs into functional apps
Integrate APIs and third-party services
Test and debug applications
Collaborate with design and backend teams
Optimize apps for performance
requirements: 3+ years of mobile app development
Proficiency in Swift/Objective-C for iOS or Java/Kotlin for Android
Experience with cross-platform frameworks (React Native, Flutter)
Knowledge of app store deployment
Understanding of mobile UI/UX principles
Portfolio of published apps

adScopeTool.title: Ad Scope Tool
adScopeTool.subtitle: Analyze and optimize your advertising campaigns with our advanced Ad Scope Tool. Get insights into performance, audience reach, and budget efficiency.

steps.title: Connect Your Accounts
steps.description: Link your advertising accounts from Google, Facebook, or other platforms.

steps.title: Analyze Data
steps.description: Our AI-powered tool analyzes your campaign data in real-time.

steps.title: Get Insights
steps.description: Receive actionable insights and recommendations for optimization.

steps.title: Optimize & Scale
steps.description: Implement changes and scale your successful campaigns.

cta.title: Start Optimizing Today
cta.subtitle: Unlock the full potential of your advertising budget with data-driven insights.
